articles.description: Reaction as 37-year-old striker Jamie Vardy scores for Leicester on their return to the Premier League as they draw with Spurs, plus all the latest transfer updates.
articles.title: Reaction: Veteran Vardy scores as Leicester draw with Spurs on return to Premier League

articles.description: Tottenham's £65m striker Dominic Solanke is upstaged by Leicester's 37-year-old Jamie Vardy as the teams begin their Premier League campaigns.
articles.title: Jamie Vardy: How Leicester City's greatest striker outshone Tottenham new boy Dominic Solanke

articles.description: Brentford forward Ivan Toney should not move to Saudi Arabia while he is at his "peak", says ex-Premier League striker Chris Sutton.
articles.title: Ivan Toney: Chris Sutton warns 'peak' England forward against Saudi Arabia move

articles.description: Wolves submit an offer to sign Arsenal and England goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale on a season-long loan deal.
articles.title: Aaron Ramsdale: Wolves bid to sign Arsenal goalkeeper on loan

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner beats Frances Tiafoe in straight sets in the Cincinnati Open final for his fifth title of the season.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Jannik Sinner beats Frances Tiafoe to win fifth title of season

articles.description: At the end of the Cold War, East Germany's systematic doping secrets spilled out. The truth on the other side of the Berlin Wall has taken longer to emerge.
articles.title: East v West Germany: The drug-fuelled Cold War for medals

articles.description: Juventus ease to victory against Cesc Fabregas' Como in Thiago Motta's first game in charge.
articles.title: Juventus 3-0 Como: Thiago Motta era starts with win against Cesc Fabregas' side

articles.description: F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions as the Formula 1 season prepares to resume with this weekend's Dutch Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Verstappen, Norris, Hamilton, Leclerc, Sainz, Piastri, Williams and street circuits

articles.description: Samoan cricketer Darius Visser sets a new men's Twenty20 International record when he hit 39 runs in a single over during a 2026 T20 World Cup regional qualifier on Tuesday.
articles.title: Darius Visser: Samoan cricketer sets new Twenty20 International record with 39 runs in a single over

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka wins her first title since January's Australian Open by powering past Jessica Pegula in the final of the Cincinnati Open.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Aryna Sabalenka beats Jessica Pegula to win first title since Australian Open
